name: Swanify: Learn Indonesian Spelling
desc: Swanify is a learning media about Indonesian spelling according to PUEBI and augmented reality features based on mobile. The project was developed for college final project using C#, Unity, and Vuforia AR.
css: mt-2 rounded-lg py-2 px-3 text-sm line-clamp-3 bg-blue-400/10 text-blue-400

name: Winzard: Play and Learn Biology
desc: Winzard is a game app combines 2D platformer game and biology learning media for students based on mobile. The project was developed for college internship by a team using C# and Unity.
css: mt-2 rounded-lg py-2 px-3 text-sm line-clamp-3 bg-yellow-400/10 text-yellow-400 dark:text-yellow-500

name: Starfield: Library Catalog
desc: Starfield is a library catalog app contains information about library catalog, plan, and location based on Android. The project was developed for college project using Java.
css: mt-2 rounded-lg py-2 px-3 text-sm line-clamp-3 bg-sky-400/10  text-sky-400

name: Wendy: Bookstore Catalog
desc: Wendy is a bookstore catalog app contains information about bookstore catalog, plan, and location based on Android. The project was developed for college project using Java.
css: mt-2 rounded-lg py-2 px-3 text-sm line-clamp-3 bg-blue-400/10 text-blue-400
